jobDescription: Engineering and design services to support the piping discipline for green fuel, oil, gas, chemical and renewable diesel projects.  Involves piping layout and design, piping stress analysis, piping material activities, creating plot plans, general arrangement of equipment and piping, pipe stress analysis, piping material specifications, reviewing vendor drawings, generating isometrics for construction and handling field queries.
preferredQualifications: Master's degree in mechanical/chemical engineering or post-graduation in piping discipline
gpaCriteria: Minimum 60% marks or Equivalent grades in Qualifying Examination
benefitsOffered: Investment in mental, physical, emotional, and financial well-being
